issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
- How To Reproduce -

1.Use the "Light" theme in the Dashboard window. You can see the IDE all white theme.

2.Edit and save something in the Studio twice so it can be comparable its difference.

3.Compare the file with "Compare with --> Local History..".

4.You will probably see the differences with all black.
fields.summary: Text comparison window in Titanium Studio with Light theme gets un-readable.
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206251749 Host OS: Mac OS X OS Arch: x86 JRE Version: 1.6.0_33

comments.body:
Hello,

What version of Studio are you using?

Sorry, did not notice you set it in the environment section; do you still see the problem with 3.0?

Thanks

Hello Davide.
Yes I can still see the problem with 3.0.

Thanks.

I forgot to describe the environment I'm using.


Host OS: Mac OS X
OS Arch: x86
JRE Version: 1.6.0_37
JRE Vendor: Apple Inc.
JRE Home: /System/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/1.6.0.jdk/Contents/Home
Install Directory: file:/Applications/Titanium Studio/
Version: 3.0.1.201212181159
VM Arguments: -Xms40m
-Xmx1024m
-Declipse.p2.unsignedPolicy=allow
-Declipse.log.size.max=10000
-Declipse.log.backup.max=5
-Xdock:icon=../Resources/titanium.icns
-XstartOnFirstThread
-Dorg.eclipse.swt.internal.carbon.smallFonts
-XX:MaxPermSize=256m
-Djava.class.path=/Applications/Titanium Studio/TitaniumStudio.app/Contents/MacOS//../../../plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.2.0.v20110502.jar
I'm not really able to reproduce the problem; what exact theme are you using? I tried a light theme (Aptana Studio 2.x) and it works fine.
